DSS.LABEL.INPUT-SEARCH-TEXT-WITHIN: input search text (within Name, Creator, Uploader)
DSS.LABEL.NAME: Name
DSS.LABEL.COLUMNS.CREATOR: Creator
DSS.MESSAGE.INFO-SEARCH-KEYWORD:
Among the search texts, contents that match the process progress data are extracted.
 If there is no match, it finds the closest keyword.
The search proceeds with the extracted keywords.
DSS.MESSAGE.INFO-SCORE: The harmonic mean of Purity and Commonality
DSS.MESSAGE.INFO-PURITY: The percentage of focused contexts matching the candidate variable condition when dividing by the total number of contexts matching the candidate variable condition.
DSS.MESSAGE.INFO-COMMONALITY: The percentage of focus contexts matching the candidate variable condition when dividing by the total number of focus contexts available for analysis.
DSS.MESSAGE.AT-LEAST-ONE-KEYWORD: You should select at least one keyword
DSS.MESSAGE.CREATE.SUBSCRIBE: The Subscribe has been created successfully.
DSS.MESSAGE.INFO-UPLOAD.TYPE: Only doc, pdf, ppt, xls available
DSS.VALIDATE.TITLE: The title is too long or not entered.

DSS.VALIDATE.KEYWORD: Please select at least one keyword.
DSS.VALIDATE.FREQUENCY: Please select at least one frequency.
DSS.VALIDATE.USERLIST: Select at least one distribution user or group.
DSS.VALIDATE.FILTERSCHECKBOX: You should select at least one checkbox
DSS.COMPONENTS.SUBSCRIPTION.MANAGEMENT.E: An error occurred while importing the subscription list.
DSS.COMPONENTS.SUBSCRIPTION.MANAGEMENT.D: Failed to get page information for drilldown in new window.
All selected subscriptions have been deleted successfully.
DSS.COMPONENTS.SUBSCRIPTION.MANAGEMENT.I: The Subscription has been inactive successfully.
An error occurred while inactive the subscription.
DSS.COMPONENTS.SUBSCRIPTION.MANAGEMENT.A: The Subscription has been active successfully.
An error occurred while active the subscription.
DSS.COMPONENTS.HISTORY.ERROR.SEARCH: There are some problems in our search service.
DSS.COMPONENTS.HISTORY.ERROR.DATA: An error occurred while importing the history data.
DSS.COMPONENTS.HISTORY.ERROR.DOWNLOAD: An error occurred while downloading the history data.
DSS.TOOLTIP.MAP.PATTERN.TYPE.SINGLE: Single: If a wafer has a visible pattern but has only one or no other wafers resembling it.
DSS.TOOLTIP.MAP.PATTERN.TYPE.SPARSE: Sparse: If a wafer has no visible pattern but a skewed failed dice location on the wafer.
DSS.TOOLTIP.MAP.PATTERN.TYPE.RANDOM: Random: If a wafer has no visible pattern but has evenly failed dice location on a wafer.
DSS.TOOLTIP.MAP.PATTERN.TYPE.LOW_DENSITY: LowDensity: If there are not enough data points in a single wafer.
DSS.TOOLTIP.MAP.PATTERN.TYPE.FOCUS: Focus: If 3 or more wafers looks similar to one another in a specific area (even one die) then a pattern will be created.
